inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide informed consent verbal or written.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to safely undergo EUS for any reason
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Coagulopathy (INR >1.6, Thrombocytopenia with platelet count <50,000/ml) for subjects on anti-coagulation therapy.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unwilling or cognitively unable to provide informed consent verbal or written.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy (confirmed with Standard of Care urine pregnancy test for all women with child-bearing potential only)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy, which showed pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
